translation.en: ♪ Let's go to Rhyme Time Town ♪
♪ So many, so many friends to see ♪
♪ I can't wait till you're here with me ♪
♪ Daisy's coming and Cole is, too ♪
translation.zh: 黛西来了 柯尔也来了

translation.en: ♪ Come on, let's go to Rhyme Time ♪
translation.zh: 来吧 一起去城里吧！

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, let's go to Rhyme Time ♪
♪ Come on, let's go to Rhyme Time Town ♪
translation.zh: -欢迎来儿歌童谣城-欢迎来儿歌童谣城

translation.en: -♪ Come on, let's go to Rhyme Time Town ♪ -[both giggling]
translation.zh: -欢迎来儿歌童谣城-欢迎来儿歌童谣城
这边 各位滴答滴答钟小助手

translation.en: Our ring of roses is almost done.
translation.zh: 我们差不多把玫瑰盆栽布置好了
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
一盆放这里 一盆放那里
-我们都倒下了-我们都倒下了
做得好 滴答滴答钟小助手

translation.en: Mayor Spoon will be so happy with the town square.
translation.zh: 汤匙市长会很满意广场的布置

translation.en: Being in your helping club is awesome!
This looks even lovelier than I thought it would.
[all] We're the Hickory Helpers, and we're here to help you!
translation.zh: 我们是滴答滴答钟小助手我们乐意协助你

translation.en: There's something else you can help me with if you'd like.
translation.zh: 还有另一件事想请你们帮我

translation.en: There's a whole field full of roses over on the farm.
translation.zh: 农场那里还有一大片玫瑰花

translation.en: Could you please put them all into pots
translation.zh: 你们可否把它们移栽进花盆

translation.en: and make more rings of roses round the square?
Yeah! We'd love to do that.
translation.zh: 好啊 我们乐意帮你

translation.en: We'll head to the farm right away.
We'll make the square really pretty.
translation.zh: 我们会把广场布置得美美的

translation.en: And we'll be helping everyone in town.

translation.zh: 滴答滴答钟小助手 出发

translation.en: We're taking all the roses into town, remember?
translation.zh: 我们要把玫瑰花运进城里 记得吗？

translation.en: Why don't we ask Jaime to be a Hickory Helper?
translation.zh: 不如我们找洁米当滴答滴答钟小助手？

translation.en: Maybe she can help us move the roses.
translation.zh: 或许她可以帮我们运送玫瑰

translation.en: Can you help us bring these roses to the town square?
translation.zh: 你可以帮我们把这些玫瑰运进广场吗？

translation.en: We're helping Mayor Spoon because we're Hickory Helpers.
translation.zh: 我们在帮汤匙市长的忙因为我们是滴答滴答钟小助手
-洁米 你好-洁米 你好
当然可以 把它们装上火车吧
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花

translation.en: She's caught a really bad cold.
Yeah. I wish we could help her feel better.
translation.zh: 对 真希望我们能让她好过点

translation.en: We can. Let's do it, Hickory Helpers!
translation.zh: 可以的 来吧 滴答滴答钟小助手

translation.en: They always cheer people up when they're sick.
translation.zh: 花总能让病人振作起来

translation.en: Let's take some flowers to Jaime.
translation.zh: 我们就送点花给洁米吧

translation.en: But what about the rings of roses in the town square?
translation.zh: 可是广场的玫瑰怎么布置？

translation.en: You go and see Jaime, and we'll take the flowers to the town square.
translation.zh: 你们去找洁米 我们把花运到广场
滴答滴答钟小助手 出发

translation.en: Jaime, we've come to help you feel better.
translation.zh: 洁米 我们来让你好过点了

translation.en: I feel fine now. Not a single sneeze.
translation.zh: 我现在好点了 一个喷嚏也没打

translation.en: These are for you, to help you feel even better.
translation.zh: 这是送给你的 让你感觉好点
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
糟了 她还是喷嚏不断

translation.en: We have to help her some more.
translation.zh: 我们要多给她一点帮助

translation.en: Hi there, Jaime. Are you feeling better now?
translation.zh: 洁米 你好 你感觉好点了吗？

translation.en: This is the strangest cold I've ever had--
translation.zh: 我从没得过这么奇怪的感冒…

translation.en: ♪ Ring around the rosie Lots of pretty posies ♪
translation.zh: 玫瑰花盆团团转 一盆盆玫瑰花

translation.en: ♪ Here, there, everywhere In Rhyme Time Town ♪
translation.zh: 放这里放那里 遍布儿歌童谣城
-糟了 矮胖子-糟了 矮胖子

translation.en: Aw, we haven't helped Jaime one bit.
translation.zh: 我们一点也帮不到洁米

translation.en: Come on, guys. Hickory Helpers never give up.
translation.zh: 大家振作起来滴答滴答钟小助手从不放弃

translation.en: But, oh, my clicking clockwork, she's one sneezy train today.
translation.zh: 但我的滴答老天啊！她今天真是架喷嚏火车

translation.en: [gasps] I know! A "get well soon" card.
translation.zh: 我知道了 给她一张“早日康复”卡

translation.en: Yeah! A really massive one 'cause her sneezes are so big.
translation.zh: 对 要超大张的 因为她打的喷嚏超大

translation.en: We can all make it together. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们可以一起制作 出发吧

translation.en: Actually, Jack and I have another idea that might help Jaime.
translation.zh: 其实我和杰克有另一个点子能帮洁米

translation.en: We'll see you at the station soon. Bye, guys.
translation.zh: 我们在火车站见面吧 各位再见

translation.en: This'll make Jaime feel better for sure.
translation.zh: 这肯定会让洁米好过点
祝你早日康复 洁米

translation.en: Is that for me? It's beautiful.
-And I'm all better now. -Wow, that was fast.
Just seeing it has made Jaime feel not sneezy.
translation.zh: 洁米光看着它就没打喷嚏了
各位滴答滴答钟小助手 做得好

translation.en: It'll look so good in my station.
translation.zh: 放在我的车站肯定很美
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
一盆放这里 一盆放那里
-我们都倒下了-我们都倒下了

translation.en: This is great! Go, Jaime, go!
translation.zh: 太棒了 快点 洁米 快点

translation.en: I wonder why your sneezes keep coming and going.
translation.zh: 真不知道你为什么一直打喷嚏

translation.en: [laughs] I don't know. No lo sé.
Poor Jaime. She's sneezed herself right out of town.
translation.zh: 洁米真可怜 她猛打喷嚏打到自己跑出城外

translation.en: But that's funny, I'm not sneezy at all now.
translation.zh: 这可真奇怪 我现在就不打喷嚏了

translation.en: Uh-oh. I know how this ends.
With a great big "we all fall down."
-I think I've figured it out. -Me, too!

translation.zh: 是杰克让洁米打喷嚏的

translation.en: I think the roses are making Jaime sneeze.
translation.zh: 应该是玫瑰花让洁米打喷嚏

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no, we put them all over town!
translation.zh: 糟了 我们把花放得满城都是

translation.en: There are rings of roses everywhere!
translation.zh: 现在城里到处都是玫瑰

translation.en: And we covered Jaime's station in them.
translation.zh: 我们还用它们堆满了洁米的车站

translation.en: So Jaime can never go home again?
translation.zh: 所以洁米以后都不能回家了？
我们是滴答滴答钟小助手 对吧？
所以我们要多出一分力

translation.en: and put the roses somewhere far away from Jaime's tracks.
translation.zh: 把玫瑰花移离洁米的轨道

translation.en: How about the hill behind Jack and Jill's workshop?
translation.zh: 杰克和吉尔的工作坊后面的山坡上？

translation.en: My tracks don't go up there.
translation.zh: 那里不是我的轨道范围
来吧 各位滴答滴答钟小助手
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
-火车呜呜叫着-火车呜呜叫着
-我们都倒下了-我们都倒下了
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
-火车呜呜叫着-火车呜呜叫着
你们让洁米不再打喷嚏

translation.en: And you helped everyone in town.
That hillside rose garden you made is beautiful!
translation.zh: 你们在山上布置的的玫瑰园实在太美了

translation.en: And as a special thank-you for being such fantastic Hickory Helpers...
translation.zh: 为了答谢你们这群优秀的滴答滴答钟小助手…
-滴答滴答贴纸-滴答滴答贴纸

translation.en: [all] We're the Hickory Helpers, and we're here to help you!
translation.zh: 我们是滴答滴答钟小助手我们乐意协助你

translation.en: There's a surprise for you at your station.
translation.zh: 车站里有个惊喜要给你
滴答滴答钟小助手 出发

translation.en: To help you have a flowery station that won't make you sneeze.
translation.zh: 为你打造一个不会让你打喷嚏的花花车站
-玫瑰花盆团团转-玫瑰花盆团团转
-一盆盆玫瑰花-一盆盆玫瑰花
-我们都倒下了-我们都倒下了
波莉、茉莉 谢谢你们

translation.en: for letting us have our own café right next to your diner.
translation.zh: 让我们在你们家餐厅旁开咖啡馆

translation.en: Can you please find the cream cheese and pineapples?
translation.zh: 你可以找来奶油奶酪和菠萝吗？

translation.en: And could you find a tomato for my tomato and spinach flan, Chef Cole?
translation.zh: 柯尔厨师 你可以找来番茄让我做番茄菠菜馅饼吗？

translation.en: You two are so good at finding things to go into the yummy food we're making.
translation.zh: 你俩很擅长找出我们料理美食需要的材料

translation.en: When do we get to lick the cheesy spoons?
translation.zh: 我们何时可以舔舔沾满起司的汤匙？

translation.en: Oh, look, it'll be lunchtime soon.
translation.zh: 看 快到午餐时间了

translation.en: We've gotta set up the Daisy-Cole Café.
translation.zh: 快把黛西柯尔咖啡馆布置好

translation.en: decide what the special dessert of the day will be.
translation.zh: 决定好今天的特色甜点

translation.en: We'll make whatever dessert you would love the most,
translation.zh: 我们会做你们最爱的甜点

translation.en: to thank you for helping us be chefs.
translation.zh: 好答谢你们让我们当厨师

translation.en: Hmm, well, you know what the best dessert would be for a lovely sunny day like this?
translation.zh: 你知道在阳光普照的日子最适合吃什么甜点吗？
看起来很美味 就做这个吧

translation.en: [sighs] But we haven't made Mulberry Delight since we were kids.
translation.zh: 可我们长大后再也没做过桑椹甜心

translation.en: We've never found a mulberry bush.
We've looked up and down, and high and low,
translation.zh: 我们找遍四周 高高低低

translation.en: and all over Rhyme Time Town.
But we never found a single mulberry.
Why don't we look for some?
Then Mulberry Delight can be the special dessert of the day.
translation.zh: 这样桑椹甜心就可以做今天的特色甜点

translation.en: We're super great at finding things.
-♪ Polly, put the kettle on ♪ -♪ We'll all have tea ♪
translation.zh: -波莉 烧壶水-我们一起喝杯茶

translation.en: -Hello! What are you guys up to? -[panting]
translation.zh: 你们好 你们要做什么？

translation.en: and make a special Mulberry Delight dessert for everyone.
translation.zh: 给大家制作特色甜点桑椹甜心

translation.en: It's kind of a berry, I guess.
We've been making a café in town.
translation.zh: 我们在城里开了咖啡馆

translation.en: It's called "The Daisy and Cole Café."

translation.zh: 我们也可以去咖啡馆玩吗？

translation.en: -Where is it? -It's over by the diner.

translation.zh: 我们可以当溜冰服务员
每家咖啡馆应该有溜冰服务员

translation.en: Oh! Do we get to eat there?
And 'cause you're helping, maybe you'll get to lick the mixing spoons.
translation.zh: 你们帮了忙 或许还可以舔舔搅拌材料的汤匙

translation.en: -What do you think? -[Humpty] Way ahead of you.
translation.zh: 你觉得怎样？ 我决定好了

translation.en: Come on, let's get to the Daisy-Cole-Humpty-Mary-Mary-Café.
translation.zh: 快出发去黛西、科尔、矮胖子跟玛莉小姐的咖啡馆吧

translation.en: Hi, Chuckley. Could you help us, please?
translation.zh: 哈哈熊 你好 可以帮个忙吗？

translation.en: We're chefs, and we want to make Mulberry Delight for Polly and Molly,
translation.zh: 我们是厨师想为波莉和茉莉做桑葚甜心

translation.en: but we don't really know what mulberries are.
translation.zh: 可我们不知道桑葚是什么

translation.en: Or what a mulberry bush looks like.
translation.zh: 也不知道桑树长什么样子

translation.en: Hmm. Neither do I, but that's no problem.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 但不要紧

translation.en: I'll just check out my big book of fruit and veggies.
translation.zh: 我只需要看看这本《蔬果大全》

translation.en: they smell a bit sour, and they're soft, but not squishy.
translation.zh: 气味略酸 软绵却不易散烂

translation.en: A mulberry bush has oval leaves shaped like this."
-Great! Will you help us find some? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 太好了 你会帮我们找吗？

translation.en: A kind of fruit I've never seen before? Just try and stop me!
translation.zh: 找一种未曾见过的水果？没人能阻挡我

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush Mulberry bush, mulberry bush ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 找桑树-我们出发找桑树 找桑树

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush On a warm and sunny morning ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨-我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -Everything we need for Mulberry Delight.
translation.zh: 制作桑葚甜心的材料都有了

translation.en: Apart from the mulberries, of course!
Great job setting up the café.
Did you decide where to put the mixing table yet?
translation.zh: 搅拌材料的桌子要放哪？

translation.en: where everyone can see the chefs at work.
translation.zh: 大家都可以看到厨师工作的样子

translation.en: Hmm, nah. Back there was better.

translation.zh: 快 那个可能就是桑葚

translation.en: Don't touch anything until I've checked it and made sure it's safe.
translation.zh: 别碰任何东西让我先检查确保没问题

translation.en: Do these berries look like the mulberries in the book?
I don't think they are mulberries.
The book said mulberries smell sour.
That's some good sniffing, Chef Daisy.
Where does your nose want us to try next?
translation.zh: 你的鼻子说我们该去哪找？

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush Mulberry bush, mulberry bush ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 找桑树-我们出发找桑树 找桑树

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush On a warm and sunny morning ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨-我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨

translation.en: We're on the hunt for mulberries. Got any growing in your orchard?
translation.zh: 我们在找桑葚你的果园有种桑树吗？

translation.en: Oh, I don't think so. They're really rare.
translation.zh: 应该没有 它们非常罕有

translation.en: -You're welcome to look around, though. -Thanks, Lucy.
translation.zh: -不过你们可以四处看看-谢谢你 露西

translation.en: Smells just right-- a little bit sour.
translation.zh: 气味对了 是酸酸的

translation.en: Uh, but it's not the right shape.

translation.zh: 而且这是偏粉红的红色

translation.en: Oh, yeah, not purplish red like in the book.
translation.zh: 对了 不像书中说的紫红色

translation.en: [sighs] I really wanted these to be mulberries.
Me, too. And it'll be lunchtime soon.
translation.zh: 我也是 午餐时间快到了

translation.en: I don't have any purplish-red berries at all.
translation.zh: 我这里没有紫红色的莓果

translation.en: But there are all sorts of berries growing in the Cradle Tree Woods.
translation.zh: 可摇篮树森林那边有各种莓果
去那里看看吧 两位厨师

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush Mulberry bush, mulberry bush ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 找桑树-我们出发找桑树 找桑树

translation.en: ♪ We're off to find a mulberry bush On a warm and sunny morning ♪
translation.zh: -我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨-我们出发找桑树 迎来和暖的早晨

translation.en: I wonder if we'll have the dessert of the day ready in time.
translation.zh: 不知道我们赶不赶得及制作今天的特色甜点

translation.en: Ready to practice roller-serving, waiter Mary Mary?
translation.zh: 准备好练习溜着冰上菜了吗？玛莉小姐

translation.en: -[Humpty wailing] -[Mary Mary] Oh! Aah, look out!
Over here. These berries smell a bit sour.
translation.zh: 过来这边 这些莓果闻起来酸酸的

translation.en: Let me just check that they're soft, but not squishy.
translation.zh: 让我看看它们是否软绵却不易散烂
好吧 它们容易散烂

translation.en: What are all the things we know about mulberry bushes?
translation.zh: 关于桑葚 我们都知道什么？

translation.en: And the leaves on the bush are...
Uh... what shape are the leaves again?
We found it! A mulberry bush!
Wait up there, speedy chefs. Gotta check everything is right.
translation.zh: 等等 心急的厨师要先检查确保没问题
莓果呈紫红色 正确
叶子呈椭圆形 正确

translation.en: Big and juicy, but not squishy?

translation.zh: 闻起来酸酸的 正确

translation.en: Everything's exactly as the book says. Good job, Chefs.
translation.zh: 所有特点符合书中描述 做得好 两位

translation.en: ♪ Here we go round the mulberry bush Mulberry bush, mulberry bush ♪
translation.zh: -我们绕着桑树丛转 转啊转-我们绕着桑树丛转 转啊转

translation.en: ♪ Here we go round the mulberry bush On a warm and sunny morning ♪
translation.zh: -我们绕着桑树丛转 迎来和暖的早晨-我们绕着桑树丛转 迎来和暖的早晨

translation.en: Another order for the special dessert of the day.
translation.zh: 又有客人点了特色甜点

translation.en: Oh, I'm so excited to taste Mulberry Delight again.
translation.zh: 我等不及再次尝尝桑葚甜心

translation.en: Time to mix up a whole lot of Mulberry Delight.
translation.zh: 是时候制作大量的桑葚甜心了

translation.en: Thanks to Chefs Daisy and Cole,
translation.zh: 多亏了黛西厨师和柯尔厨师

translation.en: we can serve up our favourite dessert at last.
translation.zh: 我们终于可以端上我们最爱的甜点

translation.en: Being chefs is super yummy fun! [giggles]
translation.zh: 当厨师又好玩又有好吃的

translation.en: Can we have some more, please?
[Polly] You can have something even better.
translation.zh: 你们可以吃更棒的东西
-那就是舔汤匙-那就是舔汤匙
